content: Just released, https://github.com/pksunkara/cargo-workspaces, a tool to manage your cargo workspaces, inspired by lerna.js.org
I used it to do the recent publishing of clap
Oh nice! Does this bump versions in Cargo.toml files like cargo-release?
Also, the dependency versions of other crates in the workspace

Sweet! That's cool.
I had a wip of this for ages but never managed to find the time to finish it! This looks very polished, excited to try it out

~k

/ sent from k9 on mobile / sorry for any bad formatting /
